body:
Hello, fellow forum user!

Yeah, not much to say! About a week ago, I decided I wanted to make another YouTube video, so I did! I decided to kind of "flow" the clips in with the music in an almost experimental type of way. I personally think it turned out great, and I hope you like it as well c:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4kq2vVoDBJY

replies.body: Wow good job, I really like how it was synchronized with the music.

replies.body: This is how montages are meant to be. Excellent effort, gameplay and editing.

replies.body: Not even kidding ITS A GREAT MONTAGE.

replies.body:
Thanks for all the support, everyone! ^-^
Also, for whoever asked, to get a view like I had in the beginning, I used some shaders and some settings. Firstly, I hit F1 in order to get rid of chat and my inventory. Then, I went into cinematic mode to get a nice, smooth look. Finally, I installed and used shaders from this video which I can't remember (I know they're in one of the description downloads). Sorry for not being able to be more specific, I had to delete my .minecraft, so I lost the exact one I used :c
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks for all the support, everyone! ^-^
Also, for whoever asked, to get a view like I had in the beginning, I used some shaders and some settings. Firstly, I hit F1 in order to get rid of chat and my inventory. Then, I went into cinematic mode to get a nice, smooth look. Finally, I installed and used shaders from this video which I can't remember (I know they're in one of the description downloads). Sorry for not being able to be more specific, I had to delete my .minecraft, so I lost the exact one I used :c
